title: Fragment, 900–1400
medium:
Medium: cotton, wool
Technique: interlocking tapestry, 1:1
Sides: both intact, remains of fabric attached to one side by interlooping
Ends: warp loops; other is cut
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Panel of tapestry in geometric design arranged in four repeats. The colors are red, yellow and rose. The ornaments are outlined in dark purple.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 900–1400.
900–1400. Medium: cotton, wool
Technique: interlocking tapestry, 1:1
Sides: both intact, remains of fabric attached to one side by interlooping
Ends: warp loops; other is cut. Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1944-89-3.
